title: Opinion | Why India Needs An Employment-Linked Incentive Policy For The Electro-Intelligence Stack
description: Artificial Intelligence faces global challenges, but India’s focus on the Electro-Intelligence stack could drive jobs, growth, and energy independence.
content:

title: AI Revolution: Unlocking Potential for Asset Managers
description: A report by McKinsey & Company highlights how artificial intelligence can reshape asset management by boosting efficiency and reducing costs. Asset managers are urged to adopt AI through six core imperatives, including domain transformation and talent strategy revamps, to enhance operations and profitability.

title: FanCode partners with CAMB.AI to provide multilingual commentary using AI for live matches
description: FanCode and CAMB.AI are collaborating to transform sports broadcasting. The partnership aims to deliver multilingual commentary using Artificial Intelligence. This will allow fans to experience live matches in multiple Indian languages. The AI will generate realistic commentary with crowd noise and advertisements. Both companies will develop custom AI solutions.
content:
FanCode on Tuesday entered a partnership with with CAMB.AI to revolutionise the sports broadcast industry. The collaboration is aimed at access to multilingual commentary using Artificial Intelligence for sports fans.

title: AI Revolutionising Fight Against Cancer And Diabetes
description: GREATER NOIDA, Sept 16:  Artificial intelligence (AI) is revolutionising how scientists study cancer and Type 1 diabetes and discover ways to fight them. From finding new drug targets and predicting who might develop disease, to tailoring treatments for individual patients, AI is reshaping biomedical research, diagnostics and therapy planning, making them faster, smarter and more precise. Every year, cancer and Type 1 diabetes take a growing toll on people worldwide. In 2022, around 20 million new cases of cancer were […]

title: Exclusive: Nvidia's new RTX6000D chip for China finds little favour with major firms, sources say
description: Nvidia's RTX6000D, its newest artificial intelligence chip tailored for the Chinese market, has seen only lukewarm demand with some major tech firms opting not to place orders, two people with knowledge of procurement discussions said.
content:
The RTX6000D, designed mainly for AI inference tasks, is seen as expensive for what it does, the two people said.
